name: DERM_SKINEXAM_FINDING
description: Clarity table for dermatology skin exam finding no-add items.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: COPY_FINDING_SRC_FINDING_ID
columns.description: This item contains the finding record that this finding was copied from. This is used for auditing purposes.

columns.name: PALETTE_FINDING_SRC_RECORD_ID
columns.description: This item contains the palette row record that the finding was added from. This is used for auditing purposes.

columns.name: PALETTE_FINDING_SRC_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Scripting Template.
